sn48.51:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati sālāya brāhmaṇagāme.
sn48.51:1.4: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā, sīho migarājā tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—thāmena javena sūrena;
sn48.51:1.5: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāya.
sn48.51:2.2: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:2.3: vīriyindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:2.4: satindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:2.5: samādhindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.51:2.6: paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
sn48.51:2.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā, sīho migarājā tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—thāmena javena sūrena;
sn48.51:2.8: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāyā”ti.
